resources.string: In order to write the storage, Step 1 please tap the “SDCARD” or “USB”, Step2 thenã€€Please tap the “Select” in the displayed screen.\n (Please tap the “Select” when the screen of “SDCARD” or “USB” in step2 is displayed directly in the upper left corner. If the upper left is other than “SDCARD” or “USB” are displayed, tap the upper left corner of the menu, from step 1 please try again.)
The root directory of the external storage was not selected. Do you wants to re select?
Permission to access external storage has been denied. You cannot save files to the external storage until you have permission to access the external storage.
Please give permission to access internal storage in order to read and write photos of internal storage and management data.
Since permission to access internal storage is not given, it is impossible to read and write photos and management data, quit the application.
